Thuso Nokwanda Mbedu (a mụrụ na 8 Julaị 1991) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa

A họpụtara ya maka International Emmy maka ọrụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri Is'Thunzi Ọ pụtara na 2018 Forbes Africa 30 n'okpuru 30 ndepụta. N'afọ 2021, ọ pụtara na Amazon Video limited series The Underground Railroad
Ọrụ ya ndị ọzọ gụnyere Kitso Medupe na ihe nkiri ncha Scandal!, Nosisa na Isibaya, na Boni Khumalo na Saints and Sinners Ọ ga-apụta na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Gina Prince-Bythewood The Woman King
A mụrụ Mbedu na Midlands Medical Centre na Pietermaritzburg, KwaZulu-Natal n'aka nne Zulu na nna Xhosa na Sotho, nke gosipụtara na aha ọdịbendị ya dị iche iche
Ọ zụlitere ya na mpaghara Pelham site n'aka nna ya Zulu, onye ghọrọ onye nlekọta iwu mgbe nne na nna ya abụọ nwụsịrị mgbe ọ dị obere.

Mbedu gara Pelham Primary School na Pietermaritzburg Girls' High School. Ọ gara n'ihu na-amụ Physical Theatre na Performing Arts Management na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand (Wits), na-agụsị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2013 na nsọpụrụ. N'afọ gara aga n'afọ 2012, ọ gara ọmụmụ ihe na Stella Adler Studio of Acting na New York City, US.
Na ngwụcha afọ 2014, Mbedu nwere obere ọrụ na oge nke abụọ nke Mzansi Magic soapie Isibaya, tupu ọ banye n'ọrụ ya dịka nwa akwụkwọ akụkọ na nwa ọhịa Kitso na Scandal!
Mgbe ahụ, o nwere ọrụ ọbịa dịka Kheti na oge nke abụọ nke usoro ihe nkiri ntorobịa SABC 2 Snake Park

Mgbe ọ na-enweghị ọrụ ọnwa isii, Mbedu nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya na telivishọn na usoro ihe nkiri ndị ntorobịa Mzansi Magic Is'Thunzi, nke malitere n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2016. N'ime usoro ahụ, ọ na-eme Winnie, onye na-eme ihe ike nke na-arọ nrọ ịlụ onye ọgaranya na onye a ma ama na-egwu egwuregwu rugby naanị ka nrọ ya mebie mgbe a chụgara ya ka ya na nwanne nne ya biri na Bergville

Mgbe ọ na-ese ihe nkiri nke ndina n'ike maka ihe ngosi ahụ, ọ nwere oke egwu. Na Septemba afọ 2017 a họpụtara ya maka onyinye Emmy nke mba ụwa na ngalaba Best Performance by an Actress maka ọrụ ya dịka Winnie na Is'Thunzi ma bụrụ naanị onye Afrịka a họpụtara n'afọ ahụ.

Mbedu mere nke mbụ ya na mba ụwa n'afọ 2021 Amazon Video akụkọ ihe mere eme nke akụkọ ihe mere e ji eme The Underground Railroad, dabere na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke otu aha nke Colson Whitehead ma duzie ma bụrụ onye isi nke onye mmeri Academy Award bụ Barry Jenkins mepụtara. Mbedu nwetara Hollywood Critics Association Award, Independent Spirit Award, na Gotham Award maka usoro ahụ.

N'ọnwa Eprel 2021, a mara ọkwa na Mbedu ga-eme ihe nkiri mbụ ya na Viola Davis na The Woman King, ihe nkiri akụkọ ihe mere eme nke sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ihe ndị mere na Alaeze Dahomey, otu n'ime steeti kachasị ike n'Africa na narị afọ nke 18 na nke 19. Gina Prince-Bythewood ga-eduzi ihe nkiri ahụ, site na edemede nke onye edemede Fatherhood bụ Dana Stevens.
